data.title: m:con – mannheim:congress GmbH
data.meta_description: More than 200 successful congresses in 10 years. m:con - mannheim:congress GmbH: Your competent congress and event agency.
data.text:
Corporate philosophy

Over 200 hugely successful congress events in the last 10 years: that’s m:con – mannheim:congress GmbH, one of the most sought-after congress and event agencies in Germany. 115 + employees ensure that events run smoothly, even across Europe and beyond Germany’s borders. With the Congress Center Rosengarten at the heart of Mannheim – a space for up to 9,000 guests – as well as other event locations with a wide range of suitable rooms in the Rhine-Neckar metropolitan region, a tailor-made solution is available for every event.

Passionate, competent, reliable – that is the standard by which we measure ourselves. Thanks to our many years of experience in organising medical and scientific congresses, we understand your requirements and interests and place them at the forefront of our activities.
